attributes.action: Healthcare Workers To be eligible for ILR after 5yrs on Healthcare Worker Visa.
attributes.additional_details:
I believe healthcare workers deserve a fair and secure pathway to settlement because they play a vital role in supporting the NHS and caring for communities across the UK. Allowing ILR after 5 years would recognise their contribution, improve job stability, and help retain experienced staff in a system that urgently needs them.
Healthcare workers face demanding conditions, long hours, and significant personal sacrifices.
attributes.background: I want the Government to allow healthcare workers to apply for Indefinite Leave to Remain (ILR) after completing 5 years on a Health and Care Worker Visa, with no additional requirements beyond the standard eligibility criteria. This would recognise the essential contribution of healthcare workers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/745684
